name: Chaos Portal
description:
Controls

  1. WASD - Move
  2. Space - Shoot

Developed by

  • C3lticlord (Code)
  • RyanN122 (Level Design + Code Support + Voice Acting)
  • MottonRose (Art)
  • Varikk (Animation)
  • Cyrano (3d backdrop Models)
  • The Wall (Voice Acting)

All assets aside from the Boss Audio, the Zombie sounds, the Graveyard music were constructed from scratch by our team, we used minimal assets and started all codebase from scratch with an exception of a quick menu plug in.
